title: Naman Dalal, MD
cleaned_text: Dr. Naman Dalal is a board-certified family medicine physician with Orlando Health Physician Associates. He diagnoses and provides care for patients from adolescence through adulthood and develops long-standing relationships with them. As a primary care doctor, he takes a holistic approach in guiding patients to prevent illness, set goals and build healthy, realistic habits. Dr. Dalal diagnoses and treats many acute and chronic conditions such as diabetes, hypertension and high cholesterol. He also focuses on disease prevention and early cancer screening. With his background in urgent care, Dr. Dalal also has experience addressing issues such as sprains, breaks and wounds. Dr. Dalal's Training Dr. Dalal earned his medical degree from the Ross University School of Medicine in Dominica. After graduation, he completed his family medicine residency at Mount Sinai South Nassau in Oceanside, New York, where he served as chief resident his final year. About Dr. Dalal Dr. Dalal's professional memberships include the American Academy of Family Physicians. He has volunteered with the American Red Cross and the Salybia Mission Project, where he organized and led free clinics, and provided medical care to the indigenous Kalinago people on the island of Dominica in the West Indies. He enjoys exercising, playing and following sports, and spending time with his growing family.
